description: A React functional component named Badge that renders a styled <span> element with configurable tone and additional class names. It is used to display badge-like UI elements with different visual styles based on the tone.

methods.name: Badge({ children, tone = 'info', className })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a styled badge element with customizable tone and className.
